mapper.select: select u_pwd,u_auth from user_t where u_id=#{u_id}
mapper.insert: insert into user_t(u_id, u_pwd, u_name, u_birth, u_email, u_tel, u_addr1, u_addr2, u_addr3, u_date) values(#{u_id}, #{u_pwd}, #{u_name}, #{u_birth}, #{u_email}, #{u_tel}, #{u_addr1}, #{u_addr2}, #{u_addr3}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select U_NAME,U_PWD,U_ADDR1 ,U_ADDR2,U_ADDR3,U_DATE ,U_BIRTH,U_tel,U_EMAIL,U_AUTH ,U_POINT ,U_MONEY from user_t where u_id=#{u_id}
mapper.update: update user_t set u_pwd = #{u_pwd}, u_tel = #{u_tel}, u_addr1 = #{u_addr1}, u_addr2 = #{u_addr2}, u_addr3 = #{u_addr3} where u_id = #{u_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) as uidcheck from user_t where u_id= #{u_id}
